description: A reference to a ServiceAccount resource.

audiences.description: Audience specifies the `aud` claim for the service account token If the service account uses a well-known annotation for e.g. IRSA or GCP Workload Identity then this audiences will be appended to the list

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount resource being referred to.

namespace.description: Namespace of the resource being referred to. Ignored if referent is not cluster-scoped. cluster-scoped defaults to the namespace of the referent.
